title: FaPow - a bomb trap game
snippet:
PICKABOMB



FaPow (Theme Orang - Wording & Red - Back color)


Definition:
===========
Admin - Company user
Host - User who setup BombTrap (Player who place BombTrap)
Player - User who drawn in BombTrap
Victim - Player who picked RateMap hit TrapPin

BombTrap - Host pick a BombRate (Eg. 200 or 1800) with a TrapPin (0-9) which consist of 11 RateMap and listing on TrapZone
RateMap - Each RateMap are randomly generated value and total of 11 RateMap must equals to BombRate
BombRate - Value of a BombTrap
TrapPin - A single numeric figure which determine the victim of a BombTrap
TrapZone - Collection of BombTrap listed by different Host (MIN 12 MAX 60)
Zone(x) - Collection of TrapZone in same ZoneRank
ZoneRank - Rank of BombValue (Eg. 30-300, 200-2000 or 1500-10000) 


Game Guide:
===========
Host will place BombTrap with a BombRate & a desire TrapPin. Admin will drawn the 1st RateMap,
the rest of the RateMap will open to all Player in that particular TrapZone. Whoever picked 
the BombRate last digit which equals to the TrapPin will detonate, victim require to gave Host
the exact amount of the BombRate.

P.S. Admin possess the privilege to purify while detonate Host BombTrap.


Rules:
======
1. Number of random RateMap while Host setup new BombTrap will consist of 11 set and TrapPin is within 0-9.
2. Each BombTrap Admin will auto pick the first RateMap (no payout while Admin detonate).
3. First packet 100% of 2% will distribute to Big Jackport (All group - commission distribute by 45-35-20 push to big pool).
4. First packet 100% of 3% will distribute to Small Jackport (Same group - commission distribute by 45-35-20 push to small pool).
5. First packet 100% of 45% will distribute to company commission.
6. First packet 100% of 50% will distribute to backend agent by Host (multilevel commissioning package).
7. Jackport control payout percent & minimum configurable and Jackport (Small & Big) percent configurable base on group.


Group category:
===============
25-250
200-500
100-1000
500-5000


Example:
========
BombTrap: 100
TrapPin : 9
RateMap : 9.09 - 10.00 - 11.00 - 8.00 - 10.41 - 13.50 - 11.50 - 10.50 - 7.00 - 13.00 - 6.00
Victim  : 9.09


Big Jackport:
=============
Every 60 seconds system will auto generate series of number, example [7]-90-31-87

Host Condition
--------------
Host 1st RateMap picked by Admin in same BombTrap combine of special number and decimal last 2 number will get 70%

Host 1st RateMap picked by Admin in same BombTrap decimal last 2 number will get 50%

Host 1st RateMap picked by Admin in 3 continuos BombTrap decimal last 2 number will get 30%


Player Condition
----------------
79031.87 = 90%

9031.87 = 50%

9087.31 = 30%
3190.87 = 30%
3187.90 = 30%
8790.31 = 30%
8731.90 = 30%

90.31   = 10%
90.87   = 10%
31.90   = 10%
31.87   = 10%
87.90   = 10%
87.31   = 10%


Small Jackport:
===============
1.11 to 9.99         = 10%
11.11 to 99.99       = 30%
111.11 to 999.99     = 50%
1111.11 to 9999.99   = 70%
11111.11 to 99999.99 = 90%
